name: In-Spectre
description:
ATTENTION: Certain ghosts have really been bugging people lately. You're tasked with finding these pesky ghosts and taking them out. Don't pick the wrong ghosts, however, they're just innocent bystanders after all!

Using your mouse, left click to select target ghosts, then wait for the next level to load!

*This was made for GGJ 2021 with the theme of Lost & Found.
